item.description:
Sie kÃ¶nnen BEBONCOOL GAMING - 4X 6200 mWh Akku fÃ¼r Xbox One/Series S/X Controller Ladestation mit coolem RGB-Licht wiederaufladbares Akkupack kompatibel mit Xbox Series X|S/S/X/Elite Wireless Controller hier:

â„¹ï¸:

  • Safe & Reliable System: With the overheating, over-current and short circuit protection system, the controller battery charging station for Xbox Series X allows you to safely charge your Xbox batteries. With the 4-point safety system, you dont have to worry about overloading at night.
  • Rechargeable batteries and charger: 4 x 6200 mWh rechargeable batteries are specially designed for Xbox Series X|S/Xbox One/Xbox One S/Xbox One X/Xbox Elite controller. The Xbox battery charging station is equipped with an on/off switch, clear LED indicators, non-slip pads and comes with a 80cm USB-C cable. Say goodbye to non-rechargeable batteries with the Xbox 2000+ rechargeable battery.
  • Easy to install and charge: These rechargeable batteries are well compatible with Xbox Series X|S/ Xbox One/ Xbox One S/ Xbox One X/Xbox One Elite controller. Place the Xbox One X batteries perfectly into the battery charger dock to charge. It is also very easy to install the Xbox battery into the Xbox controller. Please pay attention to the direction of the battery when installing the battery into the Xbox controller.
  • Fast charging and long time: The environmentally friendly Xbox One controller batteries are rechargeable over 3000 times and it only takes 3-4 hours to fully charge these 4 Xbox series controller batteries, with a battery life of 15-20 hours for each battery.
  • LED indicator: simply place the Xbox One batteries on the charging station to activate the charging process. On the front you have 4 LED indicators, one for each controller that tell you whether the controller is charging (red) or if it is full (green). The single LED on both sides of the charging station lights up when powered, and you can control it by turning the switch on and off.
